mapper.select: SELECT fake.*, fake_file.* FROM fake JOIN fake_file ON (fake.fake_no = fake_file.fake_no)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_fake (room_no, user_no, fake_check1, fake_check2, fake_check3, fake_content, use_at, agree_at, file_name) VALUES (#{roomNo}, 1, #{fakeCheck1}, #{fakeCheck2}, #{fakeCheck3}, #{fakeContent}, "Y", #{agreeAt}, #{uniqueName} )
